description:
The UB1 segment contains the data necessary to complete UB82 bills specific to the United States; other realms may choose to implement using regional code sets. Only UB82 fields that do not exist in other HL7 defined segments appear in this segment. Patient Name and Date of Birth are required for UB82 billing; however, they are included in the PID segment and therefore do not appear here. The UB codes listed as examples are not an exhaustive or current list. Refer to a UB specification for additional information.

The Uniform Billing segments are specific to the US and may not be implemented in non-US systems.

fields.name: Set ID - UB1
fields.description: This field contains the number that identifies this transaction. For the first occurrence of the segment the sequence number shall be 1, for the second occurrence it shall be 2, etc.

fields.name: Blood Deductible (43)
fields.description: As of Version 2.3, t his field has been retained for backward compatibility only.  Use IN2-21 - Blood Deductible instead of this field, as the blood deductible can be associated with the specific insurance plan via that segment. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Blood Replaced-Pints (41)
fields.description: This field contains UB82 Field 41. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Blood Not Replaced-Pints (42)
fields.description: This field contains the blood not replaced, as measured in pints. UB82 Field 42. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Co-Insurance Days (25)
fields.description: This field contains UB82 Field 25. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Condition Code (35-39)
fields.description: The code in this field repeats five times. UB82 Fields (35), (36), (37), (38), and (39). Refer to User-defined Table 0043 - Condition Code for suggested values. Refer to a UB specification for additional information. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Covered Days (23)
fields.description: This field contains UB82 Field 23. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Non Covered Days (24)
fields.description: This field contains UB82 Field 24. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Value Amount and Code (46-49)
fields.description: This field contains a monetary amount and an associated billing code. The pair in this field can repeat up to eight times to represent/contain UB82 form locators 46A, 47A, 48A, 49A, 46B, 47B, 48B, and 49B. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Value Code
fields.description: Specifies the National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC) code itself.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced by the CNE.2. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the identifier, e.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression. Its data type is string (ST). This is the corresponding text assigned by the coding system to the identifier.

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Each coding system is assigned a unique identifier. This component will serve to identify the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier.

fields.name: Alternate Identifier
fields.description: Analogous to Identifier in component 1.

fields.name: Alternate Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the alternate identifier. Analogous to "Text" in component 2. See usage notes in section introduction for further description.

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the alternate identifier component. Analogous to Name of Coding System in component 3. Refer to HL7 Table 0396 in section 2.17.5 for valid values.

fields.name: Coding System Version Id
fields.description: the version ID for the coding system identified by component 3. It belongs conceptually to components 1-3 and appears here only for reasons of backward compatibility.

fields.name: Alternate Coding System Version Id
fields.description: the version ID for the coding system identified by component -6. It belongs conceptually to the group of Alternate components (see note 2.A.6.6) and appears here only for reasons of backward compatibility.

fields.name: Original Text
fields.description: The original text that was available to an automated process or a human before a specific code was assigned.

fields.name: Value Amount
fields.description: Specifies the numeric amount when needed to pair with the value.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: The first component is a quantity.

fields.name: Denomination
fields.description: The second component is the denomination in which the quantity is expressed. The values for the denomination component are those specified in ISO-4217. If the denomination is not specified, MSH-17-country code is used to determine the default.

fields.name: Number Of Grace Days (90)
fields.description: This field contains UB82 Field 90. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Special Program Indicator (44)
fields.description: This field contains the special program indicator. UB82 Field 44. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies. Refer to User-defined Table 0348 - Special Program Indicator for suggested values. Refer to a UB specification for additional information

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the identifier, e.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression.

fields.name: Name Of Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the identifier component. The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier.

fields.name: Alternate Identifier
fields.description: An alternate sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Alternate Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the alternate identifier. See usage note in section introduction.

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the alternate identifier component.

fields.name: PSRO/UR Approval Indicator (87)
fields.description: This field contains the PSRO/UR approval indicator. UB82 field 87. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies. Refer to User-defined Table 0349 - PSRO/UR Approval Indicator for suggested values. Refer to a UB specification for additional information.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The descriptive or textual name of the identifier, e.g., myocardial infarction or X-ray impression.

fields.name: Name Of Alternate Coding System
fields.description: Identifies the coding scheme being used in the alternate identifier component.

fields.name: PSRO/UR Approved Stay-Fm (88)
fields.description: This field contains the PSRO/UR approved stay date (from). UB82 Field 88. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: PSRO/UR Approved Stay-To (89)
fields.description: This field contains the PSRO/UR approved stay date (to). UB82 Field 89. This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.

fields.name: Occurrence (28-32)
fields.description: The set of values in this field can repeat up to five times.  UB82 Fields 28-32.  This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies. Refer to a UB specification for additional information.

fields.name: Occurrence Code
fields.description: The NUBC code for the event or occurrence relating to a bill that may affect payer processing.

fields.name: Identifier
fields.description: Sequence of characters (the code) that uniquely identifies the item being referenced by the CNE.2. Different coding schemes will have different elements here.

fields.name: Text

The combination of the identifier and name of coding system components will be a unique code for a data item. Each system has a unique identifier.

fields.name: Original Text
fields.description: The original text that was available to an automated process or a human before a specific code was assigned.

fields.name: Occurrence Date
fields.description: The date the event, relating to a bill that may affect payer processing, occurred.

fields.name: Occurrence Span (33)
fields.description: UB82 Field 33.  This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies.  Refer to Userdefined Table 0351 - Occurrence Span in Chapter 2 for suggested values

fields.name: Occur Span Start Date (33)
fields.description: This field contains the occurrence span start date.  UB82 Field 33.  This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies

fields.name: Occur Span End Date (33)
fields.description: This field contains the occurrence span end date.  UB82 Field 33.  This field is defined by CMS or other regulatory agencies

fields.name: UB-82 Locator 2
fields.description: Defined by UB-82 CMS specification and maintained for backward compatibility.

fields.name: UB-82 Locator 9
fields.description: Defined by UB-82 CMS specification and maintained for backward compatibility.

fields.name: UB-82 Locator 27
fields.description: Defined by UB-82 CMS specification and maintained for backward compatibility.
